words.definition: Believing that someone is honest and reliable.

example.en: Trust is very important in friendships.

words.definition: Helping or being there for someone.
words.arabic_definition: مساعدة شخص ما أو التواجد من أجله.

example.en: Friends support each other during hard times.
example.ar: الأصدقاء يدعمون بعضهم البعض أثناء الأوقات الصعبة.

words.definition: Treating others with consideration and kindness.

example.en: We must respect each other’s opinions.
Honesty is a key part of any strong friendship.
example.ar: الصدق جزء أساسي من أي صداقة قوية.

words.definition: Staying faithful and supportive to someone.

example.en: Loyalty is what makes friends stay together.
example.ar: الوفاء هو ما يجعل الأصدقاء يبقون معًا.

words.definition: To stop being angry with someone for a mistake.
words.arabic_definition: التوقف عن الغضب من شخص بسبب خطأ.

example.en: Good friends learn to forgive each other.
example.ar: الأصدقاء الجيدون يتعلمون مسامحة بعضهم البعض.

words.definition: To give a part of what you have to someone else.
words.arabic_definition: يعطي جزءًا مما لديه لشخص آخر.

example.en: We share both happy and sad moments.
Communication is the heart of a strong friendship.
They have a special bond that lasts forever.
